title: As someone who does not hate Yasuo
body:
Why is he getting buffed?

Riot? I really don't get it

replies.body: As a yas main, I have no idea why neither, he is in a good spot right now,maybe even too strong,im pissed with this
Same, it makes no sense, if anything his R was the one thing that people don't think is overpowered, I guess Riot can't let that slide.
lets not go there it is definitely an overloaded ability especially with the hidden (will take you out of tower range if possible) LOL.
As a fellow Yasuo enthusiast I too am bewildered. It's such a strange buff too imo. Why buff the lategame damage of his ult of all things?

I'm unsure as well. But the PBE buff is only **BONUS **AD ratio, and IE's AD was nerfed. And its only on his ult, (so pretty much a single cast per fight). 

So maybe the buff won't be as big as it looks at first glance. Still don't know why he needs a buff at all...

Especially for Yasuo's who only build IE as a damage item, but idk what he really builds these days.
You're forgetting that he gets 50% armor pen after using his ult for 15 fucking seconds.

> [{quoted}](name=Xanidu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=WQo0Zjj9,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-08-07T21:28:52.987+0000)
>
> You're forgetting that he gets 50% armor pen after using his ult for 15 fucking seconds.

50%    **B O N U S** armor penetration.

Meaning he ignores 50% of Armor purchased from items and Armor gained from buffs/effects.


Bonus Armor is armor gained from purchased items or buffs/effects that grant armor such as -

* Rammus W (Defensive Ball Curl)
* Leona W. (Eclipse)
* Sejuani Passive (Frost Armor)
* Braum W. (Stand behind Me) _Grants Bonus Armor to both Braum and his ally if he jumps to a champion._
* Taric W. (Bastion) _Grants Bonus Armor to both Taric and the linked ally._
* Malphite W (Brutal Strikes)
* Poppy W. (Steadfast Presence)
* Conditioning Rune

yEA but even after the IE nerf he's still fine
sure his win rate dropped from 49 to 47% but with how popular he is and how challenging I don't think he needs buffs back

Yasuo mains won't care that his ult deals 20 less damage
When a champ has a 20+% pick ratio ,win ratio doesnt mean shit.
that's what i said though?

yeah I don't get it. 

But he hasn't been the most annoying champ in my games lately, which I guess is weak for him :P 

Garen, and to a lesser extend Yi, seem absolutely absurd right now. (Probably cuz I'm bronze :P)

Probably for some people it's just hard to get out of there because of the smurfs,  boosters,  trollers and feeders.  For me it was easy asf on my first account tho I got out of it in 6 games or something like that

lol

> half of which probably dont even know anything about League at all

very true.

> dont have time to play

Its mostly this for me. I've played about 20 games of ranked this season, mostly in the last 2 weeks. And this is the most ranked I've ever played in a season. 

The other reason is I get bored if I play as the same champion more than 5 games in row, so I'm constantly trying new champs, and never mastering any of them.
He's fine on soloQ and played often on pro play, imo he's on one of the healthiest states Yasuo has ever been and Rito buffs him reeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee.
my thoughts right now

ikr, now he'll get too strong, then get gimped, zzz the balance team "no nerfs" design lol.

(As for the other thread about this absurd buff)

I think everyone at this point has understood that this season is just gonna get worse and worse.
Think about November (pre-Season)... or March, when they could still have fixed their own game. And look at the situation now.
kinda our fault as the Community for not kicking their financial Side to 0 long ago as Payback for killing our all favorite Game.

Indeed. Actually I'm pretty surprised about people still being hyped about skins, Pool party stuff and so on.
But... just my opinion :D

Personally i love the Lore, the Champions, the Music, and almost all the Stuff around the Game itself, but the game itself is an unplayable clownfiesta that makes CoD Free for all look like a tactical strategy Game in Comparison.

I still love Riot and hope they wake up someday realizing their faults and fix this massive pile of shit that is Season 8, but my hope almost reached its very end, especially since i saw the Lee and Yasou buffs. Gotta make them Outplays n Skin Cash.
Meanwhile the sleeper OP {{champion:86}}  has 51% winrate in diamond and up with a 7% pick rate and is an S tier toplaner.  This season is somethin else lmao.

Thats it!

People are banning Garen and not Yasuo so they are buffing Yasuo to get him back on the ban...wagon

Yeah this buff is really random 
He's in a pretty good state rn
they said it was part of other changes but they are pulling them for now

being the third best mid laner isnt enough lul

Or the crit item changes were bad but his stats are still pretty good so.. no idea
You know Riot f***ed up when even I can agree with Fizz v2 on something about midlane.
As someone who plays this game, how do you not hate Yasuo?

Idk, maybe our opinions on champions depend on who we play?
I main Ashe and Lucian, playing Lucian most of the time so I'm also hypermobile and can deal with him, just don't use ult before he uses windwall

Yeah, that explains it. I play mages who get big cooldowns wasted when he presses w.
Even though I have no choice but to use them when he decides to zoom through the wave and aa me for free.

I don't hate Yasuo in a sense either I think he has a lot of potential to be a fun champion for everyone

They just need to balance out his mechanics (Not numbers/stats) remove extraneous power and advantages to reward skillful play and good decision making skills, and allow for clear areas to outplay him.

I heard the buffs were cancelled...hopefully that's true...his tornado+ult has one shot (two shot?) me in the past (I play a lot of squishies)...I can't imagine who he could one/two shot with these buffs.
When I first saw this buff I thought it was like the old April fools joke they did with 360’ wind walls. But nope it’s real. Maybe they meant to switch it to 25% ad and had a fat finger mistake lol.
No one gets it, because it doesn't make any logical sense.

I too think it wasn't needed.

He was in a good spot now, no need to make him more powerful.

They really should have asked a Yas player... what yas needed to be stronger if they wanted him to find a place in this meta. I'm fairly certain no one wanted his ultie to become a one shot tool. It's always been for the utility and the armor pen buff that followed mainly. Why massively buff its damage numbers? I guess they've just given up and decided the only thing that can make a champ work in this meta is if it can also one shot, so they gave him this.
I only play him when I get him in ARAM... if this goes through, I'm thinking of trying lethality and oneshotting people with my R.
